trans-unit.source: Describes and represents an enumeration type.
trans-unit.target: 描述并表示一个枚举类型。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, it is necessary to define enumerations using <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> because <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.EnumBuilder> emits enumerations whose elements are of type <xref:System.Int32> instead of the enumeration type.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，有必要定义使用的枚举<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>因为<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.EnumBuilder>发出其元素是类型的枚举<xref:System.Int32>而不是枚举类型。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework version 2.0, <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.EnumBuilder> emits enumerations whose elements have the correct type.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.EnumBuilder>发出其元素具有正确的类型的枚举。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the construction of an enumeration within a dynamic assembly, using `EnumBuilder`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何构造的动态程序集中，使用枚举`EnumBuilder`。

trans-unit.source: The example defines an enumeration named `Elevation`, with an underlying type of <xref:System.Int32>, and creates two elements: `Low`, with a value of 0, and `High`, with a value of 1.
trans-unit.target: 该示例定义了名为枚举`Elevation`，使用的基础类型为<xref:System.Int32>，并创建两个元素： `Low`，值为 0，和`High`，值为 1。

trans-unit.source: After the type has been created, the assembly is saved with the name `TempAssembly.dll`.
trans-unit.target: 创建的类型后，将程序集保存同名`TempAssembly.dll`。

trans-unit.source: You can use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to examine the contents of this assembly.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)其检查此程序集的内容。

trans-unit.source: Prior to the .NET Framework version 2.0, this code example does not produce a correct enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中之前, 此代码示例不会生成正确的枚举。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the dynamic assembly that contains this enum definition.
trans-unit.target: 检索包含此枚举定义的动态程序集。

trans-unit.source: Read-only.
trans-unit.target: 只读。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic assembly that contains this enum definition.
trans-unit.target: 包含此枚举定义的动态程序集。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates the use of the `Assembly` property to reference the parent assembly of the current `EnumBuilder`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用`Assembly`属性来引用当前的父程序集`EnumBuilder`。

trans-unit.source: Returns the full path of this enum qualified by the display name of the parent assembly.
trans-unit.target: 返回由父程序集的显示名称限定的此枚举的完整路径。

trans-unit.source: Read-only.
trans-unit.target: 只读。

trans-unit.source: The full path of this enum qualified by the display name of the parent assembly.
trans-unit.target: 由父程序集的显示名称限定的此枚举的完整路径。

trans-unit.source: The format of the returned string is:
trans-unit.target: 返回字符串的格式为：

trans-unit.source: \<FullTypeName>, \<AssemblyDisplayName>
trans-unit.target: \<FullTypeName>, \<AssemblyDisplayName>

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName> for a description of the format of the display name of an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName>有关程序集的显示名称的格式的说明。

trans-unit.source: Version Information
trans-unit.target: 版本信息

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework version 1.1 and earlier, the return value of this property did not include the culture or public key.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 1.1 版以及更早版本中，此属性的返回值未包括的区域性或公钥。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates the use of the `AssemblyQualifiedName` property to reference the qualified parent assembly name of the current `EnumBuilder`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用`AssemblyQualifiedName`属性来引用当前的限定的父程序集名称`EnumBuilder`。

trans-unit.source: Returns the parent <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of this type which is always <see cref="T:System.Enum" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回始终为 <see cref="T:System.Enum" /> 的此类型的父 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Read-only.
trans-unit.target: 只读。

trans-unit.source: The parent <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of this type.
trans-unit.target: 此类型的父 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object for this enum.
trans-unit.target: 创建此枚举的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object for this enum.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This type has been previously created.
trans-unit.target: 以前已创建此类型。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The enclosing type has not been created.
trans-unit.target: 尚未创建封闭类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Reflection.TypeInfo" /> object that represents this enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示此枚举的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.TypeInfo" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents this enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 表示此枚举的对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns the type that declared this <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.EnumBuilder" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回声明此 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.EnumBuilder" /> 的类型。

trans-unit.source: Read-only.
trans-unit.target: 只读。

trans-unit.source: The type that declared this <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.EnumBuilder" />.
trans-unit.target: 声明此 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.EnumBuilder" /> 的类型。

trans-unit.source: The name of the static field.
trans-unit.target: 静态字段的名称。

trans-unit.source: The constant value of the literal.
trans-unit.target: 文字的常量值。

trans-unit.source: Defines the named static field in an enumeration type with the specified constant value.
trans-unit.target: 在枚举类型中使用指定的常量值定义命名的静态字段。

trans-unit.source: The defined field.
trans-unit.target: 已定义的字段。

trans-unit.source: The defined field will have the field attributes <xref:System.Reflection.FieldAttributes.Public>, <xref:System.Reflection.FieldAttributes.Static>, and <xref:System.Reflection.FieldAttributes.Literal> set.
trans-unit.target: 定义的字段将包含字段特性<xref:System.Reflection.FieldAttributes.Public>， <xref:System.Reflection.FieldAttributes.Static>，和<xref:System.Reflection.FieldAttributes.Literal>设置。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, it is necessary to define enumerations using <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> because <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.EnumBuilder> emits enumerations whose elements are of type <xref:System.Int32> instead of the enumeration type.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，有必要定义使用的枚举<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>因为<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.EnumBuilder>发出其元素是类型的枚举<xref:System.Int32>而不是枚举类型。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework version 2.0, <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.EnumBuilder> emits enumerations whose elements have the correct type.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.EnumBuilder>发出其元素具有正确的类型的枚举。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the construction of an enumeration within a dynamic assembly, using `EnumBuilder`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何构造的动态程序集中，使用枚举`EnumBuilder`。

trans-unit.source: The example defines an enumeration named `Elevation`, with an underlying type of <xref:System.Int32>, and creates two elements: `Low`, with a value of 0, and `High`, with a value of 1.
trans-unit.target: 该示例定义了名为枚举`Elevation`，使用的基础类型为<xref:System.Int32>，并创建两个元素： `Low`，值为 0，和`High`，值为 1。

trans-unit.source: After the type has been created, the assembly is saved with the name `TempAssembly.dll`.
trans-unit.target: 创建的类型后，将程序集保存同名`TempAssembly.dll`。

trans-unit.source: You can use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to examine the contents of this assembly.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)其检查此程序集的内容。

trans-unit.source: Prior to the .NET Framework version 2.0, this code example does not produce a correct enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中之前, 此代码示例不会生成正确的枚举。

trans-unit.source: Returns the full path of this enum.
trans-unit.target: 返回此枚举的完整路径。

trans-unit.source: Read-only.
trans-unit.target: 只读。

trans-unit.source: The full path of this enum.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举的完整路径。

trans-unit.source: The returned format is "enclosingTypeFullName+nestedTypeName" for nested types and "typeName" for non-nested types.
trans-unit.target: 返回的格式为嵌套的类型和非嵌套类型"typeName"是"全名 + 名"。

trans-unit.source: This must be a bit flag from <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> : <see langword="InvokeMethod" />, <see langword="NonPublic" />, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 这必须是来自 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 的位标志：<see langword="InvokeMethod" />、<see langword="NonPublic" /> 等等。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo" /> objects representing the public and non-public constructors defined for this class, as specified.
trans-unit.target: 按照指定，返回 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo" /> 对象的数组，表示为此类定义的公共和非公共构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo" /> objects representing the specified constructors defined for this class.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo" /> 对象的数组，表示为此类定义的指定构造函数。

trans-unit.source: If no constructors are defined, an empty array is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定义任何构造函数，则返回一个空数组。

trans-unit.source: As a workaround, to retrieve the constructor of a finished type, you can retrieve the type using <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and use reflection on the retrieved type.
trans-unit.target: 作为一种解决方法，以检索已完成类型的构造函数，您可以检索类型使用<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和检索到的类型使用反射。

trans-unit.source: This method is not currently supported in types that are not complete.
trans-unit.target: 不完整类型目前不支持此方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns the custom attributes defined for this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 返回为此构造函数定义的自定义属性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to search this member's inheritance chain to find the attributes.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否搜索此成员的继承链以查找属性。

trans-unit.source: Returns all the custom attributes defined for this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 返回为此构造函数定义的所有自定义属性。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of objects representing all the custom attributes of the constructor represented by this <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回对象的数组，表示由此 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder" /> 实例表示的构造函数的所有自定义属性。

trans-unit.source: As a workaround, to retrieve the custom attributes of a finished type, retrieve the type using <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and call <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes%2A> on the returned <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: 解决方法是，若要检索已完成类型的自定义属性，检索类型使用<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>并调用<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes%2A>对返回<xref:System.Type>。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample illustrates the use of `GetCustomAttribute` in the context of <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.EnumBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用`GetCustomAttribute`的上下文中<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.EnumBuilder>。

trans-unit.source: This method is not currently supported in types that are not complete.
trans-unit.target: 不完整类型目前不支持此方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="Type" /> object to which the custom attributes are applied.
trans-unit.target: 将应用自定义属性的 <see langword="Type" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to search this member's inheritance chain to find the attributes.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否搜索此成员的继承链以查找属性。

trans-unit.source: Returns the custom attributes identified by the given type.
trans-unit.target: 返回由给定类型标识的自定义属性。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of objects representing the attributes of this constructor that are of <see cref="T:System.Type" /><paramref name="attributeType" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个对象数组，表示此构造函数属于 <see cref="T:System.Type" /><paramref name="attributeType" />。

trans-unit.source: As a workaround, to retrieve the custom attributes of a finished type, retrieve the type using <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and call <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> on the returned <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: 解决方法是，若要检索已完成类型的自定义属性，检索类型使用<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>并调用<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>对返回<xref:System.Type>。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample illustrates the use of `GetCustomAttribute` in the context of <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.EnumBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用`GetCustomAttribute`的上下文中<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.EnumBuilder>。

trans-unit.source: This method is not currently supported in types that are not complete.
trans-unit.target: 不完整类型目前不支持此方法。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method always throws <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" />.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法始终引发 <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持此方法。

trans-unit.source: No value is returned.
trans-unit.target: 不返回任何值。

trans-unit.source: This method is not currently supported.
trans-unit.target: 目前尚不支持此方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns the underlying integer type of the current enumeration, which is set when the enumeration builder is defined.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前枚举的基础整数类型，该类型是于定义枚举生成器时设置的。

trans-unit.source: The underlying type.
trans-unit.target: 基础类型。

trans-unit.source: The name of the event to get.
trans-unit.target: 要获取的事件的名称。

trans-unit.source: This invocation attribute.
trans-unit.target: 此调用属性。

trans-unit.source: This must be a bit flag from <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> : <see langword="InvokeMethod" />, <see langword="NonPublic" />, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 这必须是来自 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 的位标志：<see langword="InvokeMethod" />、<see langword="NonPublic" /> 等等。

trans-unit.source: Returns the event with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 返回具有指定名称的事件。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Reflection.EventInfo" /> object representing the event declared or inherited by this type with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.EventInfo" /> 对象，该对象表示此类型声明或继承的具有指定名称的事件。

trans-unit.source: If there are no matches, <see langword="null" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有匹配项，则返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: As a workaround, to retrieve the event of a finished type, retrieve the type using <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and use reflection on the retrieved type.
trans-unit.target: 解决方法是，若要检索的事件的已完成的类型，检索类型使用<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和检索到的类型使用反射。

trans-unit.source: This method is not currently supported in types that are not complete.
trans-unit.target: 不完整类型目前不支持此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is not supported on types that have not been completed.
trans-unit.target: 未完成的类型上不支持此方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns the events for the public events declared or inherited by this type.
trans-unit.target: 返回此类型声明或继承的公共事件的事件。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.EventInfo" /> objects representing the public events declared or inherited by this type.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.EventInfo" /> 对象的数组，表示此类型声明或继承的公共事件。

trans-unit.source: An empty array is returned if there are no public events.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有任何公共事件，则返回一个空数组。

trans-unit.source: As a workaround, to retrieve the events of a finished type, retrieve the type using <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and use reflection on the retrieved type.
trans-unit.target: 解决方法是，若要检索已完成类型的事件，检索类型使用<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和检索到的类型使用反射。

trans-unit.source: This method is not currently supported in types that are not complete.
trans-unit.target: 不完整类型目前不支持此方法。

trans-unit.source: This must be a bit flag from <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" />, such as <see langword="InvokeMethod" />, <see langword="NonPublic" />, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 这必须是来自 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 的位标志，例如 <see langword="InvokeMethod" />、<see langword="NonPublic" /> 等等。

trans-unit.source: Returns the public and non-public events that are declared by this type.
trans-unit.target: 返回此类型声明的公共和非公共事件。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.EventInfo" /> objects representing the public and non-public events declared or inherited by this type.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.EventInfo" /> 对象数组，表示此类型声明或继承的公共和非公共事件。

trans-unit.source: An empty array is returned if there are no events, as specified.
trans-unit.target: 按照指定，如果没有事件，则返回空数组。

trans-unit.source: As a workaround, to retrieve the events of a finished type, retrieve the type using <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and use reflection on the retrieved type to retrieve the events.
trans-unit.target: 解决方法是，若要检索已完成类型的事件，检索类型使用<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和使用检索到的类型反射来检索的事件。

trans-unit.source: This method is not currently supported in types that are not complete.
trans-unit.target: 不完整类型目前不支持此方法。

trans-unit.source: The name of the field to get.
trans-unit.target: 要获取的字段的名称。

trans-unit.source: This must be a bit flag from <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> : <see langword="InvokeMethod" />, <see langword="NonPublic" />, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 这必须是来自 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 的位标志：<see langword="InvokeMethod" />、<see langword="NonPublic" /> 等等。

trans-unit.source: Returns the field specified by the given name.
trans-unit.target: 返回由给定名称指定的字段。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> object representing the field declared or inherited by this type with the specified name and public or non-public modifier.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> 对象，该对象表示由此类型声明或继承的具有指定名称和公共或非公共修饰符的字段。

trans-unit.source: If there are no matches, then null is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有匹配项，则返回 null。

trans-unit.source: As a workaround, to retrieve the field of a finished type, retrieve the type using <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A> and use reflection on the retrieved type.
trans-unit.target: 解决方法是，若要检索已完成类型的字段，检索类型使用<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A>和检索到的类型使用反射。

trans-unit.source: This method is not currently supported in types that are not complete.
trans-unit.target: 不完整类型目前不支持此方法。

trans-unit.source: This must be a bit flag from <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" />, such as InvokeMethod, NonPublic, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 这必须是来自 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 的位标志，例如 InvokeMethod、NonPublic 等。

trans-unit.source: Returns the public and non-public fields that are declared by this type.
trans-unit.target: 返回此类型声明的公共和非公共字段。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> objects representing the public and non-public fields declared or inherited by this type.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> 对象的数组，表示此类型声明或继承的公共和非公共字段。

trans-unit.source: An empty array is returned if there are no fields, as specified.
trans-unit.target: 按照指定，如果没有字段，则返回空数组。

trans-unit.source: As a workaround, to retrieve the field of a finished type, retrieve the type using <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and use reflection on the retrieved type.
trans-unit.target: 解决方法是，若要检索已完成类型的字段，检索类型使用<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和检索到的类型使用反射。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.EnumBuilder.GetFields%2A> method does not return fields in a particular order, such as alphabetical or declaration order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.EnumBuilder.GetFields%2A>方法不返回字段按特定的顺序，如按字母顺序排列或声明顺序排列。

trans-unit.source: Your code must not depend on the order in which fields are returned, because that order can vary.
trans-unit.target: 因为该顺序可能会变化，你的代码必须不依赖于字段的返回顺序。

trans-unit.source: This method is not currently supported in types that are not complete.
trans-unit.target: 不完整类型目前不支持此方法。

trans-unit.source: The name of the interface.
trans-unit.target: 接口的名称。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="true" />, the search is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则搜索不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="false" />, the search is case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="false" />，则搜索区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: Returns the interface implemented (directly or indirectly) by this type, with the specified fully-qualified name.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的完全限定名返回此类型（直接或间接）实现的接口。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object representing the implemented interface.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象，该对象表示实现的接口。

trans-unit.source: Returns null if no interface matching name is found.
trans-unit.target: 如果未找到名称匹配的接口，则返回 null。

trans-unit.source: As a workaround, to retrieve the interface of a finished type, retrieve the type using <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and use reflection on the retrieved type.
trans-unit.target: 解决方法是，若要检索已完成类型的接口，检索类型使用<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和检索到的类型使用反射。

trans-unit.source: This method is not currently supported in types that are not complete.
trans-unit.target: 不完整类型目前不支持此方法。

trans-unit.source: The type of the interface for which the interface mapping is to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 要为其检索接口映射的接口的类型。

trans-unit.source: Returns an interface mapping for the interface requested.
trans-unit.target: 返回所请求的接口的接口映射。

trans-unit.source: The requested interface mapping.
trans-unit.target: 所请求的接口映射。

trans-unit.source: As a workaround, to retrieve the interface mapping types of a finished type, retrieve the type using <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and use reflection on the retrieved type.
trans-unit.target: 解决方法是，若要检索的已完成类型的接口映射类型，检索类型使用<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和检索到的类型使用反射。

trans-unit.source: The type does not implement the interface.
trans-unit.target: 此类型不实现此接口。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of all the interfaces implemented on this a class and its base classes.
trans-unit.target: 返回在此类及其基类上实现的所有接口的数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of <see cref="T:System.Type" /> objects representing the implemented interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象的数组，表示已实现的接口。

trans-unit.source: If none are defined, an empty array is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定义任何内容，则返回一个空数组。

trans-unit.source: As a workaround, to retrieve the interface of a finished type, retrieve the type using <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and use reflection on the retrieved type.
trans-unit.target: 解决方法是，若要检索已完成类型的接口，检索类型使用<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和检索到的类型使用反射。

trans-unit.source: The name of the member.
trans-unit.target: 成员名。

trans-unit.source: The type of member that is to be returned.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的成员的类型。

trans-unit.source: This must be a bit flag from <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> : <see langword="InvokeMethod" />, <see langword="NonPublic" />, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 这必须是来自 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 的位标志：<see langword="InvokeMethod" />、<see langword="NonPublic" /> 等等。

trans-unit.source: Returns all members with the specified name, type, and binding that are declared or inherited by this type.
trans-unit.target: 返回具有指定名称、类型并由此类型声明或继承其绑定的所有成员。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> objects representing the public and non-public members defined on this type if <paramref name="nonPublic" /> is used; otherwise, only the public members are returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 <paramref name="nonPublic" />，则返回 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> 对象的数组，表示在此类型上定义的公共和非公共成员；否则，仅返回公共成员。

trans-unit.source: As a workaround, to retrieve the member of a finished type, retrieve the type using <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and use reflection on the retrieved type.
trans-unit.target: 解决方法是，若要检索完成的类型的成员，检索类型使用<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和检索到的类型使用反射。

trans-unit.source: This method is not currently supported in types that are not complete.
trans-unit.target: 不完整类型目前不支持此方法。

trans-unit.source: This must be a bit flag from <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> : <see langword="InvokeMethod" />, <see langword="NonPublic" />, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 这必须是来自 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 的位标志：<see langword="InvokeMethod" />、<see langword="NonPublic" /> 等等。

trans-unit.source: Returns the specified members declared or inherited by this type,.
trans-unit.target: 返回此类型声明或继承的指定成员。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> objects representing the public and non-public members declared or inherited by this type.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> 对象的数组，表示此类型声明或继承的公共和非公共成员。

trans-unit.source: An empty array is returned if there are no matching members.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有匹配的成员，则返回空数组。

trans-unit.source: As a workaround, to retrieve the members of a finished type, retrieve the type using <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and use reflection on the retrieved type.
trans-unit.target: 解决方法是，若要检索已完成类型的成员，检索类型使用<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和检索到的类型使用反射。

trans-unit.source: This method is not currently supported in types that are not complete.
trans-unit.target: 不完整类型目前不支持此方法。

trans-unit.source: This must be a bit flag from <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" />, such as <see langword="InvokeMethod" />, <see langword="NonPublic" />, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 这必须是来自 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 的位标志，例如 <see langword="InvokeMethod" />、<see langword="NonPublic" /> 等等。

trans-unit.source: Returns all the public and non-public methods declared or inherited by this type, as specified.
trans-unit.target: 按照指定，返回此类型声明或继承的所有公共和非公共方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> objects representing the public and non-public methods defined on this type if <paramref name="nonPublic" /> is used; otherwise, only the public methods are returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 <paramref name="nonPublic" />，则返回 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 对象数组，表示在该类型上定义的公共和非公共方法；否则，仅返回公共方法。

trans-unit.source: As a workaround, to retrieve the methods of a finished type, retrieve the type using <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and use reflection on the retrieved type.
trans-unit.target: 解决方法是，若要检索已完成类型的方法，检索类型使用<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和检索到的类型使用反射。

trans-unit.source: This method is not currently supported in types that are not complete.
trans-unit.target: 不完整类型目前不支持此方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the name of the nested type to get.
trans-unit.target: 包含要获取的嵌套类型的名称的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: A bitmask comprised of one or more <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> that specify how the search is conducted.
trans-unit.target: 一个位屏蔽，由一个或多个指定搜索执行方式的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 组成。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: Zero, to conduct a case-sensitive search for public methods.
trans-unit.target: 零，表示对公共方法执行区分大小写的搜索。

trans-unit.source: Returns the specified nested type that is declared by this type.
trans-unit.target: 返回此类型声明的指定嵌套的类型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object representing the nested type that matches the specified requirements, if found; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示符合指定要求的嵌套类型的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象（如果找到）；否则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: As a workaround, to retrieve the nested type of a finished type, retrieve the type using <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and use reflection on the retrieved type.
trans-unit.target: 解决方法是，若要检索已完成类型的嵌套的类型，检索类型使用<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和检索到的类型使用反射。

trans-unit.source: This method is not currently supported in types that are not complete.
trans-unit.target: 不完整类型目前不支持此方法。

trans-unit.source: This must be a bit flag from <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" />, such as <see langword="InvokeMethod" />, <see langword="NonPublic" />, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 这必须是来自 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 的位标志，例如 <see langword="InvokeMethod" />、<see langword="NonPublic" /> 等等。

trans-unit.source: Returns the public and non-public nested types that are declared or inherited by this type.
trans-unit.target: 返回此类型声明或继承的公共和非公共嵌套类型。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Type" /> objects representing all the types nested within the current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that match the specified binding constraints.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象数组，表示当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 中嵌套的与指定的绑定约束匹配的所有类型。

trans-unit.source: An empty array of type <see cref="T:System.Type" />, if no types are nested within the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />, or if none of the nested types match the binding constraints.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 中未嵌套任何类型，或者如果没有一个嵌套类型与绑定约束匹配，则为类型 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 的空数组。

trans-unit.source: As a workaround, to retrieve the nested types of a finished type, retrieve the type using <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and use reflection on the retrieved type.
trans-unit.target: 解决方法是，若要检索已完成类型的嵌套的类型，检索类型使用<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和检索到的类型使用反射。

trans-unit.source: This method is not currently supported in types that are not complete.
trans-unit.target: 不完整类型目前不支持此方法。

trans-unit.source: This invocation attribute.
trans-unit.target: 此调用属性。

trans-unit.source: This must be a bit flag from <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> : <see langword="InvokeMethod" />, <see langword="NonPublic" />, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 这必须是来自 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 的位标志：<see langword="InvokeMethod" />、<see langword="NonPublic" /> 等等。

trans-unit.source: Returns all the public and non-public properties declared or inherited by this type, as specified.
trans-unit.target: 按照指定，返回此类型声明或继承的所有公共和非公共属性。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> objects representing the public and non-public properties defined on this type if <paramref name="nonPublic" /> is used; otherwise, only the public properties are returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 <paramref name="nonPublic" />，则返回 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> 对象的数组，表示在此类型上定义的公共和非公共属性；否则，仅返回公共属性。

trans-unit.source: As a workaround, to retrieve the properties of a finished type, retrieve the type using <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and use reflection on the retrieved type.
trans-unit.target: 解决方法是，若要检索已完成类型的属性，检索类型使用<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和检索到的类型使用反射。

trans-unit.source: This method is not currently supported in types that are not complete.
trans-unit.target: 不完整类型目前不支持此方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns the GUID of this enum.
trans-unit.target: 返回此枚举的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: Read-only.
trans-unit.target: 只读。

trans-unit.source: The GUID of this enum.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates the use of the `GUID` property to reference the associated <xref:System.Guid> of the current `EnumBuilder`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用`GUID`属性来引用关联<xref:System.Guid>的当前`EnumBuilder`。

trans-unit.source: This method is not currently supported in types that are not complete.
trans-unit.target: 不完整类型目前不支持此方法。

trans-unit.source: The name of the member to invoke.
trans-unit.target: 要调用的成员的名称。

trans-unit.source: This can be a constructor, method, property, or field.
trans-unit.target: 这可以是构造函数、方法、属性或字段。

trans-unit.source: A suitable invocation attribute must be specified.
trans-unit.target: 必须指定合适的调用属性。

trans-unit.source: Note that it is possible to invoke the default member of a class by passing an empty string as the name of the member.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，可以通过将一个空字符串作为成员的名称进行传递来调用一个类的默认成员。

trans-unit.source: The invocation attribute.
trans-unit.target: 调用属性。

trans-unit.source: This must be a bit flag from <see langword="BindingFlags" />.
trans-unit.target: 这必须是来自 <see langword="BindingFlags" /> 的位标志。

trans-unit.source: An object that enables the binding, coercion of argument types, invocation of members, and retrieval of <see langword="MemberInfo" /> objects using reflection.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，它使用反射启用绑定、参数类型的强制、成员的调用和 <see langword="MemberInfo" /> 对象的检索。

trans-unit.source: If binder is <see langword="null" />, the default binder is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 binder 为 <see langword="null" />，则使用默认活页夹。

trans-unit.source: See <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" />.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" />。

trans-unit.source: The object on which to invoke the specified member.
trans-unit.target: 对其调用指定成员的对象。

trans-unit.source: If the member is static, this parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果该成员为静态，则忽略此参数。

trans-unit.source: An argument list.
trans-unit.target: 自变量列表。

trans-unit.source: This is an array of objects that contains the number, order, and type of the parameters of the member to be invoked.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个对象的数组，该对象包含要调用的成员的参数的数量、顺序和类型。

trans-unit.source: If there are no parameters this should be null.
trans-unit.target: 如果不存在任何参数，则这应为 null。

trans-unit.source: An array of the same length as <c>args</c> with elements that represent the attributes associated with the arguments of the member to be invoked.
trans-unit.target: 与 <c>args</c> 长度相同的数组，其元素表示与要调用的成员的自变量关联的属性。

trans-unit.source: A parameter has attributes associated with it in the metadata.
trans-unit.target: 参数在元数据中具有与之相关联的属性。

trans-unit.source: They are used by various interoperability services.
trans-unit.target: 它们由不同的互操作性服务使用。

trans-unit.source: See the metadata specs for details such as this.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多详细信息，请参阅元数据规范。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see langword="CultureInfo" /> used to govern the coercion of types.
trans-unit.target: 用于控制类型强制的 <see langword="CultureInfo" /> 的实例。

trans-unit.source: If this is null, the <see langword="CultureInfo" /> for the current thread is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果这是 NULL，则使用当前线程的 <see langword="CultureInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: (Note that this is necessary to, for example, convert a string that represents 1000 to a double value, since 1000 is represented differently by different cultures.)
trans-unit.target: （注意，这对于某些转换是必要的，例如，将表示 1000 的 String 转换为 Double 值，因为不同区域性的 1000 表示形式不同。）

trans-unit.source: Each parameter in the <c>namedParameters</c> array gets the value in the corresponding element in the <c>args</c> array.
trans-unit.target: <c>namedParameters</c> 数组中的每个参数获取 <c>args</c> 数组中对应元素的值。

trans-unit.source: If the length of <c>args</c> is greater than the length of <c>namedParameters</c>, the remaining argument values are passed in order.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>args</c> 的长度大于 <c>namedParameters</c> 的长度，则剩余的参数值将按顺序传递。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the specified member.
trans-unit.target: 调用指定的成员。

trans-unit.source: The method that is to be invoked must be accessible and provide the most specific match with the specified argument list, under the contraints of the specified binder and invocation attributes.
trans-unit.target: 在指定活页夹和调用特性的约束下，要调用的方法必须是可访问的，并且提供与指定自变量列表最精确的匹配。

trans-unit.source: Returns the return value of the invoked member.
trans-unit.target: 返回被调用的成员的返回值。

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve the type using <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and use reflection on the retrieved type.
trans-unit.target: 你可以检索类型使用<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和检索到的类型使用反射。

trans-unit.source: This method is not currently supported in types that are not complete.
trans-unit.target: 不完整类型目前不支持此方法。

trans-unit.source: The object to test.
trans-unit.target: 要测试的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a specified <see cref="T:System.Reflection.TypeInfo" /> object can be assigned to this object.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值表示是否可以将指定的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.TypeInfo" /> 对象赋值给此对象。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="typeInfo" /> can be assigned to this object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以将 <paramref name="typeInfo" /> 赋值给此对象，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this object represents a constructed generic type.
trans-unit.target: 获取指示此对象是否表示构造的泛型类型的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this object represents a constructed generic type; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此对象表示构造泛型类型，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="Type" /> object to which the custom attributes are applied.
trans-unit.target: 将应用自定义属性的 <see langword="Type" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to search this member's inheritance chain to find the attributes.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否搜索此成员的继承链以查找属性。

trans-unit.source: Checks if the specified custom attribute type is defined.
trans-unit.target: 检查是否定义了指定的自定义属性类型。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if one or more instance of <paramref name="attributeType" /> is defined on this member; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在此成员上定义了一个或多个 <paramref name="attributeType" /> 的实例，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: As a workaround, to check if a custom attribute is defined for a finished type, retrieve the type using <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A> and call <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes%2A> on the returned <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: 解决方法是，若要检查是否为已完成的类型定义的自定义特性，检索类型使用<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A>并调用<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes%2A>对返回<xref:System.Type>。

trans-unit.source: This method is not currently supported in types that are not complete.
trans-unit.target: 不完整类型目前不支持此方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object representing an array of the current type.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示当前类型数组的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object representing a one-dimensional array of the current type, with a lower bound of zero.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象，该对象表示当前类型的一维数组（下限为零）。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object representing a one-dimensional array of the current type, with a lower bound of zero.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个表示当前类型的一维数组（下限为零）的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The number of dimensions for the array.
trans-unit.target: 数组的维数。

trans-unit.source: This number must be less than or equal to 32.
trans-unit.target: 此数字必须小于或等于 32。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object representing an array of the current type, with the specified number of dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象，该对象表示一个具有指定维数的当前类型的数组。

trans-unit.source: An object representing an array of the current type, with the specified number of dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 表示当前类型的指定维数的数组的对象。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rank" /> is less than 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rank" /> 小于 1。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object that represents the current type when passed as a **ref** parameter (**ByRef** parameter in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象，该对象表示作为 ref 参数（在 Visual Basic 中为 ByRef 参数）传递时的当前类型。

trans-unit.source: Sets custom attributes for this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 设置此构造函数的自定义属性。

trans-unit.source: An instance of a helper class to define the custom attribute.
trans-unit.target: 用于定义自定义属性的帮助程序类的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: Sets a custom attribute using a custom attribute builder.
trans-unit.target: 使用自定义属性生成器设置自定义属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample illustrates the use of `SetCustomAttribute` in the context of <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.EnumBuilder>, passing a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用`SetCustomAttribute`的上下文中<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.EnumBuilder>，并传递<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="con" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="con" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The constructor for the custom attribute.
trans-unit.target: 自定义属性的构造函数。

trans-unit.source: A byte blob representing the attributes.
trans-unit.target: 表示属性的字节 blob。

trans-unit.source: Sets a custom attribute using a specified custom attribute blob.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的自定义属性 blob 设置自定义属性。

trans-unit.source: See the metadata specification in the ECMA Partition II documentation for details on how to format `binaryAttribute`.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何设置格式，请参阅 ECMA 第 ii 部分文档，有关详细信息中的元数据规范`binaryAttribute`。

trans-unit.source: The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.
trans-unit.target: 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用`SetCustomAttribute`的上下文中<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.EnumBuilder>，传递的字节 blob。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="con" /> or <paramref name="binaryAttribute" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="con" /> 或 <paramref name="binaryAttribute" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Reserved for future use.
trans-unit.target: 留待将来使用。

trans-unit.source: Must be IID_NULL.
trans-unit.target: 必须为 IID_NULL。

trans-unit.source: Passed-in array of names to be mapped.
trans-unit.target: 要映射的名称的传入数组。

trans-unit.source: Count of the names to be mapped.
trans-unit.target: 要映射的名称的计数。

trans-unit.source: The locale context in which to interpret the names.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中解释名称的区域设置上下文。

trans-unit.source: Caller-allocated array which receives the IDs corresponding to the names.
trans-unit.target: 调用方分配的数组，用于接收与名称对应的 ID。

trans-unit.source: Maps a set of names to a corresponding set of dispatch identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 将一组名称映射为对应的一组调度标识符。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息`IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`，请参阅 MSDN 库。

trans-unit.source: The method is called late-bound using the COM <c>IDispatch</c> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为使用 COM <c>IDispatch</c> 接口的后期绑定。

trans-unit.source: The type information to return.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的类型信息。

trans-unit.source: The locale identifier for the type information.
trans-unit.target: 类型信息的区域设置标识符。

trans-unit.source: Receives a pointer to the requested type information object.
trans-unit.target: 接收一个指针，指向请求的类型信息对象。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the type information for an object, which can then be used to get the type information for an interface.
trans-unit.target: 检索对象的类型信息，然后可以使用该信息获取接口的类型信息。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `IDispatch::GetTypeInfo`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息`IDispatch::GetTypeInfo`，请参阅 MSDN 库。

trans-unit.source: The method is called late-bound using the COM <c>IDispatch</c> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为使用 COM <c>IDispatch</c> 接口的后期绑定。

trans-unit.source: Points to a location that receives the number of type information interfaces provided by the object.
trans-unit.target: 指向一个位置，该位置接收对象提供的类型信息接口的数量。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the number of type information interfaces that an object provides (either 0 or 1).
trans-unit.target: 检索对象提供的类型信息接口的数量（0 或 1）。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `IDispatch::GetTypeInfoCount`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息`IDispatch::GetTypeInfoCount`，请参阅 MSDN 库。

trans-unit.source: The method is called late-bound using the COM <c>IDispatch</c> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为使用 COM <c>IDispatch</c> 接口的后期绑定。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the member.
trans-unit.target: 标识成员。

trans-unit.source: Reserved for future use.
trans-unit.target: 留待将来使用。

trans-unit.source: Must be IID_NULL.
trans-unit.target: 必须为 IID_NULL。

trans-unit.source: The locale context in which to interpret arguments.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中解释参数的区域设置上下文。

trans-unit.source: Flags describing the context of the call.
trans-unit.target: 描述调用的上下文的标志。

trans-unit.source: Pointer to a structure containing an array of arguments, an array of argument DISPIDs for named arguments, and counts for the number of elements in the arrays.
trans-unit.target: 指向一个结构的指针，该结构包含一个自变量数组、一个命名自变量的 DISPID 自变量数组和数组中元素数的计数。

trans-unit.source: Pointer to the location where the result is to be stored.
trans-unit.target: 指向要存储结果的位置的指针。

trans-unit.source: Pointer to a structure that contains exception information.
trans-unit.target: 指向一个包含异常信息的结构的指针。

trans-unit.source: The index of the first argument that has an error.
trans-unit.target: 第一个出错自变量的索引。

trans-unit.source: Provides access to properties and methods exposed by an object.
trans-unit.target: 提供对某一对象公开的属性和方法的访问。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.target: 此方法称为使用 COM <c>IDispatch</c> 接口的后期绑定。

trans-unit.target: 只读。

trans-unit.target: 此枚举的内部句柄。

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve the type using <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and use reflection on the retrieved type.
trans-unit.target: 你可以检索类型使用<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和检索到的类型使用反射。

trans-unit.target: 只读。

trans-unit.target: 只读。
